bug.short_desc: search for projects within group doesn't work
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
>>> client = copr.create_client2_from_file_config() >>> [x for x in client.projects.get_list(owner="@rpm-software-management")] []
python-copr-1.68-1.fc24.noarch
We have at least 2 repos in that group.
Modified in 62515c2
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.
